Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

H3DSAMPLE

The basic type H3DSAMPLE is a handle to 3D digital audio sample.

Discussion

H3DSAMPLE handles are returned from the AIL_allocate_3D_sample_handle function.


Group: Basic Types
Related Functions: AIL3DSAMPLECB, AIL_3D_sample_attribute, AIL_3D_sample_cone, AIL_3D_sample_distances, AIL_3D_sample_effects_level, AIL_3D_sample_length, AIL_3D_sample_loop_count, AIL_3D_sample_obstruction, AIL_3D_sample_occlusion, AIL_3D_sample_offset, AIL_3D_sample_playback_rate, AIL_3D_sample_status, AIL_3D_sample_volume, AIL_allocate_3D_sample_handle, AIL_end_3D_sample, AIL_register_3D_EOS_callback, AIL_release_3D_sample_handle, AIL_resume_3D_sample, AIL_set_3D_sample_cone, AIL_set_3D_sample_distances, AIL_set_3D_sample_effects_level, AIL_set_3D_sample_file, AIL_set_3D_sample_info, AIL_set_3D_sample_loop_block, AIL_set_3D_sample_loop_count, AIL_set_3D_sample_obstruction, AIL_set_3D_sample_occlusion, AIL_set_3D_sample_offset, AIL_set_3D_sample_playback_rate, AIL_set_3D_sample_preference, AIL_set_3D_sample_volume, AIL_start_3D_sample, AIL_stop_3D_sample
